text: Tom Peter Starke (born 18 March 1981) is a German former professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. He played for six German Bundesliga clubs throughout his career that lasted for 18 seasons. == Club career statistics == Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Bayer Leverkusen II 2000–01 Regionalliga Nord 0 0 1 0 — — 1 0 2001–02 20 0 — — — 20 0 2002–03 22 0 — — — 22 0 2003–04 0 0 1 0 — — 1 0 2005–06 5 0 — — — 5 0 Total 47 0 2 0 0 0 0 0 49 0 — Hamburger SV (loan) 2003–04 Bundesliga 2 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 2 0 Hamburger SV II (loan) 2003–04 Regionalliga Nord 2 0 — — — 2 0 Bayer Leverkusen Bundesliga 2004–05 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 0 1 0 Paderborn 2005–06 2.
